responsibilities: Designed and developed RESTful APIs using Laravel for web and mobile applications.
Optimized database queries and improved system performance, resulting in a 30% reduction in response time.
Collaborated with the front-end team to integrate APIs with Angular and React applications.
Implemented user authentication, role-based access control, and data validation for enhanced security.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to maintain code quality and best practices.
Built and maintained e-commerce websites using Laravel and integrated payment gateways.
Worked on migration and data seeding to transition from older versions of Laravel to newer versions.
Implemented cron jobs and scheduled tasks for automated data processing and notifications.
Developed custom packages and extensions to extend Laravel functionality as needed for various projects.
Participated in client meetings to gather project requirements and provide technical solutions.
Assisted in the development of Laravel-based web applications and websites.
Maintained and updated existing Laravel projects, fixing bugs and improving functionality.
Learned and implemented best practices for version control, code organization, and coding standards.
Collaborated with senior developers on various aspects of project development.
Participated in code testing and debugging efforts to ensure project quality.
